dublin_core.dcvalue: Autism is a complex neurobiological disorder that is part of a group of disorders known as autism spectrum disorders ASD Today one in 150 individuals is diagnosed with autism Lack of social interaction and problems with communication are the main characteristics displayed by children with ASD The Picture Exchange Communication System PECS is a communication system where children exchange visual symbols as a form of communication The visual symbols are laminated pictures stored in a binder We have designed developed and are currently testing a software application called PixTalk which works on any Windows Mobile Smart phone Teachers and caregivers can access a web site and select from an online library the images to be downloaded on to the Smart phone Children can browse and select images to express their intentions desires and emotions using PixTalk Case study results indicate that PixTalk can be used as part of ongoing therapy
